explains: adj. 沉闷的，令人沮丧的

sentences.en: His old dreams had been so pleasant; but this reality was so dreary!
sentences.cn: 他的旧梦是如此美好；但现实是如此的枯燥！

sentences.en: Sunshine had come again into the blind woman's life, and made her days less dark and dreary.
sentences.cn: 阳光又回到了失明的奶奶的生活中，使她的日子不那么黑暗和沉闷了。

sentences.en: The house looked grim and dreary in the rain.
sentences.cn: 这房子在雨中显得阴郁凄凉。
